metadata.title: CVE-2019-14865 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the grub2-set-bootflag utility of grub2. A localattacker could run this utility under resource pressure (for example bysetting RLIMIT), causing grub2 configuration files to be truncated andleaving the system unbootable on subsequent reboots.

criterions.comment: grub2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
